item.title: Guillermo Del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’ Is a Monster Made in Canada
item.description: With a crew stacked with Directors Guild of Canada — Ontario talent, the Oscar winner’s latest gothic epic was built on Toronto soundstages, icy ship sets and a decades-long creative bond.
